about_the_game:
This game is a multiplayer shooter/survival game, it has many features including driving and swimming as well as a full building and resources system, more features and levels plus different abilities will be added as it further development continues, the current game has 1 level which has a score counter as well as a timer for completing the game level, along with how many foes are left in the game, there are many weapons included, including assault rifles, pistols, laser rifles, bows grenades etc etc, with more to be added, there will be vehicles in the game that can run out of fuel and explode, there are currently only two types of vehicles in the game.


This ongoing developed game was built entirely in Epic's unreal Engine 5.4

Credits
A special thanks to.
Music and sound:- Iestyn Haberfield
UI graphics and logo:- Hristo Itchov

As well as the following assets used from Epic Marketplace
Ultimate Multiplayer Survival Pack V5 for fps and tps game mechanics
Post appocolyptic city for the main game map
Military Weap Silv for aded explosions and gun sounds
Sci fi sound pack for alien weapons and alien sounds in general

content_descriptors.notes: The violence in the game is mostly basic cartoon 3d style based, with some blood shown.

name: Alien Town Invasion

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600/AMD Ryzen 3 1300X
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 4GB/AMD Radeon R9 380 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400/AMD Ryzen 5 2600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB /AMD Radeon RX 590 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Sci fi survival multiplayer based game, this game will be an ongoing development.
